main.name: Jaydev Thomke
main.description: Self driven Full Stack Developer who always wants to explore new technologies. Programming Language/Framework is no bar. Problem solver and also a fast learner. R&D is something that I have always craved for.
main.bio: I am a self driven full stack developer. If you as me Angular or React? I'll say both. Every framework is perfect in its own way. If you ask me Frontend or Backend? I'll say Backend. Nodejs/Express is something I am very good at. Java(Spring, Hibernate) is somrthing I would love to work on.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me if you find my profile relevent. Thanks for that opportunity in advance!!

Developer a stock managenet software for a firm in MIDC as a final year project. (Java, Swing)
